statements: SELECT * FROM purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history;
SELECT product_id, purchase_timestamp FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS average_amount FROM purchase_history;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, purchase_date FROM Recommendations WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, location FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%john%' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Recommendations ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM Recommendations WHERE product_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, location FROM Users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT username, age FROM Users WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM Recommendations WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM shoppers;
SELECT shopper_name, shopper_email FROM shoppers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT shopper_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM shoppers JOIN purchases ON shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id;
SELECT shopper_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM shoppers JOIN purchases ON shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM shoppers;
SELECT shopper_name, shopper_email FROM shoppers ORDER BY shopper_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT shopper_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM shoppers JOIN products ON shoppers.shopper_id = purchases.shopper_id AND products.product_id = purchases.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' OR product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_score FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT Users.username, PurchaseHistory.quantity, Products.product_name FROM Users JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Users.user_id = PurchaseHistory.user_id JOIN Products ON PurchaseHistory.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_purchases FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, product_id FROM Recommendations WHERE user_id = '7b92ec5d-690f-4f5d-b9c0-fbd51b006ea3';
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, ph.purchase_date FROM Users u JOIN Products p ON u.user_id = p.product_id JOIN PurchaseHistory ph ON u.user_id = ph.user_id WHERE ph.quantity > 1 ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM Recommendations WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category, product_name;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers c INNER JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, od.quantity FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN OrderDetails od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN Products p ON p.product_id = od.product_id WHERE od.quantity > 3 ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, p.product_name;
